item.title: Forum Framework Recommendation: Discourse
item.author: Author
item.description: Discourse is an open source forum framework. I found it is used in the forum I visited. I did an installation on the $5 Digital Ocean Droplet. Then I realize a lot of forums are using it by recognizing its optional styles. The official website is here. At first glance, the website does not mention self-hosting options. But in the “about” page, you will find the Github repository. Note on Digital Ocean Droplet The installation is extremely easy.
